briefdescription.para: The MPI rank number of the I/O Processor (probably rank 0). This rank is usually used to write to stdout.

detaileddescription.para: return the rank number local to the current Parallel Context
return the number of MPI ranks local to the current Parallel Context

briefdescription.para: Is this CPU the I/O Processor? To get the rank number, call IOProcessorNumber()

detaileddescription.para: This topic documents the MPI-facing API, such as amrex::ParallelDescriptor. amrex::FabArray operations that may use MPI (e.g., ghost exchange and parallel copies) are documented under Communication for Distributed Fab Data.
